name: Das Seat
description:
Germany has fallen under a harsh regime where everyone is forced to be seated at all times by order of the furniture-führer: Sitler. For many years the citizens have been forced to scoot their chairs all over the place.

One man, Stan, has had enough of this after losing his son who was killed in a car crash due to not being able to scoot his chair fast enough.

He'll use the system to his advantage by scooting around like a law abiding citizen, then take the enemy by surprise as he rises up and uses the chair as both a weapon and a shield.

The mission to dethrone Sitler and bring him to his knees begins now.
